featured.text: They draw elegant henna crowns on the women’s bare heads to help them 18 the loss of their hair after cancer treatment.
This 18-year-old sprinted to the finish of a 12-mile run with his bare feet bleeding.
But now the garden looked shabby and bare.
Instead of the traditional bare pod-sized style, new chains now feature interior design that appeals to digitally connected travelers from around the world.

definition.zh_def: 光禿禿的；未覆蓋的；赤裸的
definition.example: The tree stood bare after losing all its leaves in winter.
